swig-of-sake

- Find out about spoilers without getting spoiled

In the manga community, spoilers for an upcoming chapter usually come out a few days before the actual chapter release. It's difficult to avoid the spoilers espcially if you're someone that frequently engages with the community. This site was created in order to give people a taste of what's in the spoilers without actually spoiling the contents. Information such as: Are there french scans out yet? How hype is the chapter? Will there be a break next week?

Below we only give a glimpse of the upcoming One Piece chapter. But soon, this site will grow to include other manga such as My Hero Academia, Attack on Titan, and others.

One Piece

Chapter 996

Raws available

No break next week

Unknown hype level

Unknown chapter title

One Piece is a best-selling manga series written by Eiichiro Oda. It follows the journey of Monkey D. Luffy as he seeks to become king of the pirates.

Reddit NarutoForums Discord

Subscribe to get the latest updates on swigofsake.com

About this page
I love anime and manga! I've followed many different series week-by-week and by far the hardest part about being a weekly reader is the dreaded period of time when I know there are spoilers out there. I always wished there was a way to get a small taste of the chapter without actually getting spoiled, hence, I created this small site.

This is the MVP version of this page. There's a lot more in the roadmap including a mobile app if people find this valuable enough.

The page is hosted at Github Pages

Made with passion by Randy Raymond - USA

Help contribute at Github
